import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Planet3D from '../components/Planet3D'; import './Home.css'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const [planetConfig, setPlanetConfig] = useState({ color: '#4a90e2', size: 1, lightIntensity: 1, lightColor: '#ffffff', rotationSpeed: 1, wireframe: false, metalness: 0.1, roughness: 0.8, craterDensity: 0.3, mountainHeight: 0.1, surfaceDetail: 0.5 }); const handleConfigChange = (key: string, value: any) => { setPlanetConfig(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); }; return (

Planeta 3D Interactivo

handleConfigChange('color', e.target.value)} />
handleConfigChange('size', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('lightIntensity', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('lightColor', e.target.value)} />
handleConfigChange('rotationSpeed', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('metalness', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('roughness', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('craterDensity', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('mountainHeight', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
handleConfigChange('surfaceDetail', parseFloat(e.target.value))} />
